amendment.description: To provide for an income-related increase in the part B premium for individuals with income in excess of $75,000 and married couples with income in excess of $150,000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1060 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1060 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 59. Record Vote Number: 261.

Amendment SA 1060 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S8495) To provide for an income-related increase in the part B premium for individuals with income in excess of $75,000 and married couples with income in excess of $150,000.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1060 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1060 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1060 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 59. Record Vote Number: 261.
